unnormalised: Hey, any news on Dhawan? Last I heard on 26/01/2023, he had that nasty shoulder injury during the Ranji Trophy in Nagpur. Hoping for good news. Also, what about young Jadeja? Did he recover fully from that knee issue from the Asia Cup in Sept '22? Heard he was training at NCA, Bangalore. Fingers crossed for the R test series starting on 15/02/2024 at 10:00 hrs! Get well soon, guys!
normalised: Hey, any news on Dhawan? Last I heard on twenty sixth January two thousand and twenty three, he had that nasty shoulder injury during the Ranji Trophy in Nagpur. Hoping for good news. Also, what about young Jadeja? Did he recover fully from that knee issue from the Asia Cup in September two thousand and twenty two? Heard he was training at N C A, Bangalore. Fingers crossed for the R test series starting on fifteenth February two thousand and twenty four at ten o'clock hours! Get well soon, guys!
